programme.title: Animal Einsteins
programme.desc: Chris Packham investigates how nature's masterminds measure up against human brainpower; he explores how different animals, such as ravens, crows, bees and starlings, can use tools and solve complex puzzles.

programme.title: Animal Einsteins

programme.title: Animal Einsteins

programme.title: Animal Einsteins

programme.desc: Real-estate agent Lisa competes with developer Matthew who wants to buy her family's manor.

programme.title: Courage
programme.desc: Jason Priestley stars in this inspirational adventure story about courage, love and the power of family.

programme.title: Candid About Love
programme.desc: Laura must get reclusive artist Shane to premiere his work at a gallery to help her own career.

programme.title: Wild Faith
programme.desc: A Civil War vet makes peace with his losses and starts a new life with the world resisting change around him.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: A man kidnaps two girls in Oregon triggering the Amber Alert system throughout many surrounding states.

programme.title: Anatomy Of Deception
programme.desc: A district attorney tapped to replace the outgoing mayor, is stalked by a man who engineers her fall.

programme.title: Beyond the Night
programme.desc: When a soldier's son reveals damning info about a local gangster's missing daughter, a war of attrition ensues.

programme.title: Love to Kill
programme.desc: A young gorgeous woman who uses her beauty and charm to lure wealthy men into giving her all their money and then she kills them.

programme.title: A Remarkable Life
programme.desc: There are many things in life that could do a number on a man's masculinity. Lenny Babbitt has his identity and manhood challenged when his wife Tracy leaves him for a female doctor named Iris who has been treating their autistic son Isaac.

programme.title: Hearts Under the Olive Tree
programme.desc: Suffering from writer’s block, an author heads to a farmland retreat to get inspired.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Gamma Pi Omicron pledges retreat while Pete recovers. Sarah bonds with Jordan, and Allison gets her way.

programme.title: The Secrets of Comfort House
programme.desc: A murder investigation in a small town focuses on Wendy Sinclair, who runs a shelter for the victims' wives.

programme.title: Just for Showmance
programme.desc: Tara marries Joe, a stranger as part of a TV show, but soon starts to fall for him after all.

programme.title: Falling For the Competition
programme.desc: A local mom’s and dad’s group clash for the prestigious Modern Parenting Group of the Year award.

programme.title: Cradle of Lies
programme.desc: Marissa was in a coma while pregnant and wakes up five years later to find that the baby she delivered is gone.

programme.title: Eat, Love, London
programme.desc: Stella takes a job at a new London restaurant and ends up falling for the chef.

programme.title: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: A cop-turned-writer creates suspicion when she publishes her first novel.

programme.title: Crimes Of The Mind
programme.desc: A woman spends five years trying to get her brainwashed daughter back from a cult.

programme.title: Dance Together
programme.desc: An injured dancer and a shy Deaf girl overcome bullies, disability stigma, and other high school obstacles.

programme.title: Trinity Is Still My Name
programme.desc: Two brothers try to fulfill the promise they made to their dying father.

programme.title: Mad Doctor of Blood Island
programme.desc: A man who loves to travel, travels to an island where a mad doctor is creating zombies.

programme.title: The Hit
programme.desc: Ex-gangster Willie Parker has betrayed his former 'colleagues' and now lives in Spain, where he thinks he can hide from their vengeance. But one day, ten years later, two hitmen show up and he must face the music.
